Another can be done at range, so even if you think you're at a safe distance, be ready to dodge if he adopts a stance and then dashes up for a glowing elbow strike attack.
img_below_text:
By far his most dangerous move will come when he adopts a martial arts stance, holding a raised fist behind his head while dropping the other arm.
![Wukong Brook 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ee/Wukong_Brook_24.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a snowy battlefield from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing a combat encounter between the player character, Wukong, and an enemy. Wukong is seen wielding a glowing weapon, preparing for battle, while the enemy adopts a stance, possibly signaling an imminent attack. The preceding and following text highlights the enemy's dangerous moves, including a glowing elbow strike and a martial arts stance, emphasizing the need for strategic dodging and awareness during the fight.
